colour.plotting.dataset.astm_g_173 Module¶

ASTM G-173 Solar Spectral Irradiance¶

Defines the solar spectral irradiance spectral power distribution used in various plotting objects.

References

[1]Renewable Resource Data Center. (2003). Reference Solar Spectral Irradiance: ASTM G-173. Retrieved August 23, 2014, from http://rredc.nrel.gov/solar/spectra/am1.5/ASTMG173/ASTMG173.html
colour.plotting.dataset.astm_g_173.ASTM_G_173_ETR = <colour.colorimetry.spectrum.SpectralPowerDistribution object>¶

Extraterrestrial Radiation (solar spectrum at top of atmosphere) at mean Earth-Sun distance.

ASTM_G_173_ETR : SpectralPowerDistribution
